verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> when there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that there was a <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H1481>sojourning<s%> on the <S%H3411>side<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> who <S%H3947>took<s%> to him a <S%H6370>concubine<s%> out of <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah.<s%>

And his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> played the <S%H2181>whore<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and <S%H3212>went<s%> away from him to her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah,<s%> and was <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%>

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her, to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3820>friendly<s%> to her, and to <S%H7725>bring<s%> her <S%H7725>again,<s%> having his <S%H5288>servant<s%> with him, and a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H2543>asses:<s%> and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him into her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> and when the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> him, he <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him.

And his <S%H2859>father<s%> in <S%H2859>law,<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H2388>retained<s%> him; and he <S%H3427>stayed<s%> with him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> so they did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> when they <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that he <S%H6965>rose<s%> up to <S%H3212>depart:<s%> and the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H2860>son<s%> in <S%H2859>law,<s%> <S%H5582>Comfort<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> with a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> your way.

And they <S%H3427>sat<s%> down, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together:<s%> for the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man,<s%> Be <S%H2974>content,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, and <S%H3885>tarry<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night, and let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H3190>merry.<s%>

And when the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up to <S%H3212>depart,<s%> his <S%H2859>father<s%> in <S%H2859>law<s%> <S%H6484>urged<s%> him: therefore he <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And he <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> on the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3212>depart;<s%> and the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5582>Comfort<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you. And they <S%H4102>tarried<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H5186>afternoon,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them.

And when the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up to <S%H3212>depart,<s%> he, and his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> his <S%H2859>father<s%> in <S%H2859>law,<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7503>draws<s%> toward <S%H6150>evening,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you <S%H3885>tarry<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night: <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2583>grows<s%> to an <S%H2583>end,<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> that your <S%H3824>heart<s%> may be <S%H3190>merry;<s%> and to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> get you <S%H7925>early<s%> on your <S%H1870>way,<s%> that you may <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H168>home.<s%>

But the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H3885>tarry<s%> that night, but he <S%H6965>rose<s%> up and <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5227>over<s%> <S%H5227>against<s%> <S%H2982>Jebus,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> is <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and there were with him <S%H6776>two<s%> <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H2280>saddled,<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> also was with him.

And when they were by <S%H2982>Jebus,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H3966>far<s%> <S%H7286>spent;<s%> and the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, and let us <S%H5493>turn<s%> in <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in it.

And his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, We will not <S%H5493>turn<s%> aside here <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of a <S%H5237>stranger,<s%> that is not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> we will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us draw <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of these <S%H4725>places<s%> to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night, in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>

And they <S%H5674>passed<s%> on and <S%H3212>went<s%> their <S%H3212>way;<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> down on them when they were by <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belongs to <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

And they <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside <S%H8033>thither,<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in and to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah:<s%> and when he <S%H935>went<s%> in, he <S%H3427>sat<s%> him down in a <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> for there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H622>took<s%> them into his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H3885>lodging.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H4639>work<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> which was also of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and he <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah:<s%> but the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> were <S%H1145>Benjamites.<s%>

And when he had <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> he <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H732>wayfaring<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H575>Where<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> you? and from <S%H370>where<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> you?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, We are <S%H5674>passing<s%> from <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah<s%> <S%H5704>toward<s%> the <S%H3411>side<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> am I: and I <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah,<s%> but I am now <S%H1980>going<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H622>receives<s%> me to <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H1571>Yet<s%> there is <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>provender<s%> for our <S%H2543>asses;<s%> and there is <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> for me, and for your <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> and for the <S%H5288>young<s%> man which is with your <S%H5650>servants:<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4270>want<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

And the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be with you; <S%H7535>howsoever<s%> let <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4270>wants<s%> lie on me; <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> not in the <S%H7339>street.<s%>

So he <S%H935>brought<s%> him into his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and gave <S%H1101>provender<s%> to the <S%H2543>asses:<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

Now as they were making their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H3190>merry,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H582>certain<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> <S%H5437>beset<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5437>round<s%> about, and <S%H1849>beat<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H1817>door,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3318>Bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> your <S%H1004>house,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> him.

And the <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to them, and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H408>No,<s%> my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> no, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, do not so <S%H7489>wickedly;<s%> <S%H310>seeing<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5039>folly.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> here is my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> a <S%H1330>maiden,<s%> and his <S%H6370>concubine;<s%> them I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> out <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H6031>humble<s%> you them, and <S%H6213>do<s%> with them what <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to you: but to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H2063>so<s%> <S%H5039>vile<s%> a <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

But the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to him: so the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2388>took<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> her <S%H3318>forth<s%> to them; and they <S%H3045>knew<s%> her, and <S%H5953>abused<s%> her <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> and when the <S%H7837>day<s%> began to <S%H5927>spring,<s%> they let her <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H6437>dawning<s%> of the <S%H1242>day,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> down at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> her <S%H113>lord<s%> was, <S%H5704>till<s%> it was <S%H216>light.<s%>

And her <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H3212>go<s%> his <S%H1870>way:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> was <S%H5307>fallen<s%> down at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and her <S%H3027>hands<s%> were on the <S%H5592>threshold.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, Up, and let us be <S%H3212>going.<s%> But <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H6030>answered.<s%> Then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> her up on an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H3212>got<s%> him to his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And when he was <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H3979>knife,<s%> and laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> on his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and <S%H5408>divided<s%> her, together with her <S%H6106>bones,<s%> into <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it was so, that <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7200>saw<s%> it <S%H559>said,<s%> There was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2063>such<s%> deed <S%H1961>done<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H7760>consider<s%> of it, take <S%H5779>advice,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> your minds.
